ordered_victim_rescue.condition: Moderate injuries with burns on hands and feet
Minor injury with cuts and bruises only

action_details: The prioritization of victims for rescue is based on the severity of their injuries. Victim 1 requires immediate attention due to critical injuries, which pose a significant risk to their life. Victim 2 has moderate injuries but can potentially be treated in a more controlled environment outside the fire zone. Victim 3 has minor injuries and should be evacuated last. Rescuers will use PPE and TICs to locate individuals while maintaining a safe distance from the fire.
